original_text: Then we will give you our daughters and take your daughters for ourselves. We’ll settle among you and become one people with you.
korean_text: 우리 딸을 너희에게 주며 너희 딸을 우리가 데려오며 너희와 함께 거주하여 한 민족이 되려니와

sentences.original_text: Then we will give you our daughters
and take your daughters for ourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희 딸들을 우리가 아내로 삼겠다

sentences.original_text: and become one people with you
